ADS.Text1: If you ever know about Poppy Horror characters, it's Playtime for you to get started in this game.
ADS.Text2: Don't let Huggy wuggy catch you, scary find out where you are, when and where you will be found is up to you.
ADS.Text3: Play the role of a seeker or a hider. You will need to find your suitable shelters to be safe and free and be the mystery last survival from Huggy Wuggy..
ADS.Text4: Hide in the water, grass, cornfield or anywhere you want away from the boss and push others in the seeker's vision range. It will be so much fun!.
ADS.Text5: This includes the pufferpoppy's roll, the piranha's bite, the flying poppy's flight. There may be times where are stuck and don't know how to advance.
ADS.Text6: The toys of Playtime Co. are a lively bunch! From Bot to Huggy, Catbee to Poppy. This amazing GrabPack is a wearable backpack, accompanied by 2 artificial hands attached via a steel wire.
ADS.Text7: You'll never forget this adventure in Poppy playtime, it's horror and puzzles scary games. Enjoy now, learn how to win and escape from the Poppy Playtime huggy wuggy game.
ADS.Text8: Rate Us 5 Stars And Download New poppy playtime and Let's start your endless journey with the classic poppy hide and seek game and enjoy endless fun with Huggy Wuggy!
